body: 1: Charles Linehan Company Dance at the Brighton festival opens with this double bill, featuring a duet for original BalletBoyz Michael Nunn and William Trevitt that riffs on the conventions of ballet mime and A Quarter Plus Green, exploring ideas of transformation. Brighton Dome, Sat & Sun 2: Rambert The excellent dancers of Rambert are showcased in this nicely mixed bill, which features a new work from pioneering Australian dance maker Lucy Guerin, with music by sound artist Scanner. Sadler’s Wells, EC1, Tue to 14 May 3: New Shoots   Freddie Opoku-Addaie has co-programmed this evening of new work, exploring the range of styles and themes embraced by choreographers of the African diaspora. The Place, WC1, Thu
webTitle: Three of the best… new dance shows
